sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="list-host">
    <v-data-table
      :headers="hostUsers.headers"
      :items="hostUsers.data"
      :items-per-page="5"
      class="elevation-1"
    >
      <template v-slot:item.actions="props">
        <v-btn small v-on:click="activeUserRoleHost(props.item.userId)">Active</v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-data-table>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      hostUsers: {
        headers: [
          { text: "First Name", value: "firstName" },
          { text: "Last Name", value: "lastName" },
          { text: "Age", value: "age" },
          { text: "Address", value: "address" },
          { text: "Status", value: "isEnabled" },
          { text: "", value: "actions", sortable: false }
        ],
        data: []
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    activeUserRoleHost(_userId) {
      let vm = this;
      const options = {
        method: "PUT",
        headers: { Authorization: localStorage.getItem("jwtToken") },
        url: "http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/user/active/" + _userId
      };
      vm.$axios(options)
        .then(() => {
          alert("done!");
        })
        .catch(e => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    }
  },
  mounted: function() {
    let vm = this;
    vm.$axios
      .get(`http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/users`, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: localStorage.getItem("jwtToken")
        },
        params: {
          isEnabled: 2,
          isHost: 1
        }
      })
      .then(response => {
        vm.hostUsers.data = response.data.content;
      })
      .catch(e => {
        console.log(e);
      });
  }
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
